name: Dawn of Zombies: Survival
summary: DoZ is an online simulator of survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Here, those who lived through Conflagration were left to survive against hunger, aberrations, fanatical mutants and zombies, diseases, and radiation. And, of course, other survivors. Get through the withering heat and deadly frost as a natural born survivalist. Collect resources and prey day by day. Be careful, though: the Territories become much more dangerous when the night falls.
